Key Match Events: India posted the highest total at the Sir Vivian Richards Stadium in Antigua with 196 runs for the loss of 5 wickets
Bangladesh struggled to get going from the very start and were restricted to 146/8 in their 20 overs
Miscellaneous Highlights: Najmul Shanto made a massive blunder at the toss by choosing to bat first in a day game
Others: Hardik Pandya won the player of the match award
Kuldeep Yadav found spin and bounce on the pitch, and claimed the best figures for India on the day - 4-0-19-3
Jasprit Bumrah finished with the figures of - 4-0-13-2
